properties.areaDesc: Waters from Jupiter Inlet to Deerfield Beach FL from 20 to 60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 4 at 3:03AM EST until January 4 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Miami FL
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, southwest winds around 20
kt with gusts up to 25 kt and seas around 3 feet expected. For
the Gale Watch, northwest winds 20 to 30 kt expected. Frequent
gusts up to 35 to 40 kt possible. Seas 6 to 10 feet expected,
with locally higher seas possible especially over the Gulf
Stream.

* WHERE...Waters from Jupiter Inlet to Deerfield Beach FL from
20 to 60 NM.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, from 7 AM this morning to
7 PM EST this evening. For the Gale Watch, from this evening
through Sunday afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and seas.

A sudden onset of rough seas may cause hazardous conditions,
which may occur suddenly at jetties and inlets. These conditions
could catch boaters by surprise. Boaters should use caution when
entering or exiting the inlets and jetty areas.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM THIS MORNING TO 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...GALE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON
